bug.author: wooksong
bug.summary: [CI/CD] Urgent! OBS failed in building nnstreamer for all architectures
bug.description: It looks a python package required by meson is missing. We need to fix it. [ 69s] + meson --buildtype=plain --prefix=/usr --sysconfdir=/etc --libdir=/usr/lib64 --bindir=/usr/lib/nnstreamer/bin --includedir=/usr/include -Dinstall-example=true -Denable-tensorflow=true build [ 69s] Traceback (most recent call last): [ 69s] File "/usr/bin/meson", line 6, in <module> [ 69s] from pkg_resources import load_entry_point [ 69s] ModuleNotFoundError: No module named 'pkg_resources' [ 69s] error: Bad exit status from /var/tmp/rpm-tmp.KHMV6C (%build)

comments.comment: : Thank you for posting issue <denchmark-link:https://github.com/nnstreamer/nnstreamer/issues/1220>#1220</denchmark-link> . The person in charge will reply soon.
Uh. shit. They've updated Tizen;Base recently: accepted/tizen/base/20190308.035718 On the next business day, we need further testing and write the bug report at bugs.tizen.org

OK.. <denchmark-link:https://review.tizen.org/gerrit/#/c/platform/upstream/meson/+/201129/>https://review.tizen.org/gerrit/#/c/platform/upstream/meson/+/201129/</denchmark-link> This fixes the error. As a workaround you may add <denchmark-code>BuildRequires: python3-setuptools </denchmark-code>
to nnstreamer.spec

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/wooksong>@wooksong</denchmark-link> Please follow up with <denchmark-link:https://review.tizen.org/gerrit/#/c/platform/upstream/meson/+/201129/>https://review.tizen.org/gerrit/#/c/platform/upstream/meson/+/201129/</denchmark-link> and contact its maintainers to accelerate SR process. Without nagging them, it make take a month or longer to have the fix released.

<denchmark-link:https://review.tizen.org/gerrit/gitweb?p=platform/upstream/meson.git;a=commit;h=f1591678c9cc990a8b7ad5a0b34ded1b3b4f97dc>https://review.tizen.org/gerrit/gitweb?p=platform/upstream/meson.git;a=commit;h=f1591678c9cc990a8b7ad5a0b34ded1b3b4f97dc</denchmark-link>
Tizen:Base SR Accepted. OBS updated and no more such errors.

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/myungjoo>@myungjoo</denchmark-link> They created <denchmark-link:https://review.tizen.org/gerrit/#/c/platform/upstream/meson/+/201139/>their own patch</denchmark-link> this morning and merged it. They said that it will be applied (means SR) next Monday since this is a base package.
